amendment.description: Amendment sought to require Accomack County, VA to pay the Federal Government fair market value for the land and sought to require an appraisal of the land prior to sale.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to require Accomack County, VA to pay fair market value for the land and require an appraisal of the land prior to sale.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 226 (Roll no. 115).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 226 (Roll no. 115).
